entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is the captain of Harry's team. He is mentioned as giving advice to his team before the match.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is the Seeker for the Ravenclaw team and is described as being extremely pretty.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a member of Wood's team. He is mentioned as feeling nervous before the match.

relationships.description: Wood is the captain of his team, and he shakes hands with the Ravenclaw Captain.
Harry's team faces off against Cho Chang's team in the match.
